text: Eupogonius flavocinctus Eupogonius infimus The type species of the genus, Eupogonius pauper Eupogonius is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae.Biolib.cz - Eupogonius. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It was described in J. Acad. Nat. Sci. Philad. by John Lawrence LeConte in 1852. The species are found across Eastern North America south to Argentina in forests and woodlots. == Species == ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Eupogonius
